results.name: Smallest number with same factorization shape as n.
comment: A284456 defines the factorization shape of a number.
A284456 corresponds to the fixed points of this sequence.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: 3) Sort the values computed at step 2 in descending order (keeping duplicates): you obtain, say, f_1 >= ... >= f_k,
